judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: The complainant is absent with steps vide petition no. 3215    showing grounds which is allowed.The date is fixed for necessary order.I have gone through the statement of complainant and the video clip contained in CD provided by the complainant.The complainant alleges that the accused no. 1 being a news channel anchor cum editor in chief, had projected Papon @ Angaraj Mahanta, a renowned singer, as accused of sexually harassing an eleven year old child by kissing her lips, the video of which had become viral in social media facebook.At the outset, let me make it clear that I am not dealing with case against Papon for harassing an eleven year old child.It is the news channel against whom the complainant is alleging that it had projected papon as abusing an eleven year old girl by kissing her lips.According to the complainant, the act is absolutely out of affection towards the girl, and not with any other intention. And it is the news channel, which allegedly blowing up the matter to the extent of sexual assault.So, there is no dispute about the truth of the video clip. The complainant only objects the presentation of the news.I have gone through the video clip, from which I have come to know that the accused Arnab Goswami, an anchor of a debate show in news channel Republic TV, called a panel of eminent media personnel, child right activists, persons from the field of law and bollywood to debate on the point to express their views on the act done by singer Papon. Some of the panellists condemned the act of Papon and some of the panellists defending Papon, saying that it was an affectionate act on the part of the singer.A news channel debate is a trend now and the object of such a debate is to ask views of the panellists and let the viewers know about their views on a particular news and various facets of it. The republic TV is an English news channel and its contents are supposed to be viewed by matured viewers.In the case in hand, the news, i.e. the video clip is not disputed. But, the manner of presentation of the news has been objected by complainant to be defamatory on the part of singer Papon. The accused-anchor of the debate show invited the panellists to share views on the particular video clip. The anchor did not impose the viewers of the show to believe the negative side of the video clip. He actually invited people to share their views on the topic. The viewers of the show from such a debate would be able to think from different angles of news. The video clip was actually thrown to public to form opinion about the singer by conducting a debate from eminent persons of the society, who spoke either in favour of against the singer Papon. The debate show in my opinion, would not defame the singer Papon in the eyes of viewers.In the background of my above discussion, I am of the opinion that the accused has not defamed the singer Papon by conducting his debate show. As such, I do not find sufficient grounds to proceed against the accused persons.Hence, the complaint is dismissed.
